actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A013) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 27, 31, 38, 43, 44, 45, 46, 47, 49, 54, 81, 84, 85, 95, 96, 97, 114, 143, 164, and 165 printed in House Report 113-108. See page D566 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
purpose: Consisting of amendments printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 numbered 27, 31, 38, 43, 44, 45, 46, 47, 49, 54, 81, 84, 85, 95, 96, 97, 114, 143, 164, and 165.
